name: Mt Kenya
description: Trek Africa's second-highest peak through misty forests and alpine meadows.

name: Mt Ruwenzori
description: Explore the mystical Mountains of the Moon along the Uganda-Congo border.

name: Lake Nakuru
description: Witness flamingos, rhinos, and scenic lake views in a compact safari park.

name: Tsavo National Park
description: One of Kenya’s largest parks home to red elephants and volcanic landscapes.

name: Nairobi National Park
description: Safari with skyscrapers in the background—minutes from Kenya’s capital.

name: Coastal Kenya
description: Relax on white sand beaches, explore Swahili culture, and dive coral reefs.
